question: if a group of person is reading the holy Quraan , one person at a time and the others are following him. When at the time of Khatmul Quraan , will it be accounted that each &everyone has completed the reading of the holy Quraan
answer:
QUESTION

Please kindly inform me if a group of person is reading the holy Quraan , one person at a time and the others are following him. When at the time of Khatmul Quraan , will it be accounted that each &everyone has completed the reading of the holy Quraan and whether they have got the sawaab of reading the quraan completely? 

ANSWER


Share:

If one person has recited the Quraan and others just merely listened to the recitation, both the reader and those who listened to the recitation will get the reward of Khatmul Quraan.

And Allah Knows Best

Muhammed Zakariyya Desai
